root.name: GetAmped
root.description: Features-Character CustomizationPlayers can customize their character.-Fashion GalleriaPlayers can change their avatar.-Simple Key ControlPlayers can play easily.-TrainingPlayer can train their own character.-Gaming ModesThe games features 7 type of modesGame ModesAmped ChampionshipTeam ChampionshipAmped DeathmatchTeam DeathmatchAmped SportsMatchAmped DogfightTeam DogfightPC System RequirementsOS: Win98/2000/ME/XPCPU: Pentium 3 600MhzRAM: 128MBVideo: Graphics 3D acceleration card with OpenGL 1.1 supportSound: Sound 16-bit Sound cardHard Drive: 300MB
